      • validateCharacters

        public Boolean validateCharacters​(String s)
                           throws InvalidCharacterException
        Validates input key
        Parameters:
        s - string containing key
        Returns:
        true if key consists only of english letters
        Throws:
        InvalidCharacterException - when an encountered character is not a letter from english alphabet

      • validateData

        public Boolean validateData()
                     throws InvalidCharacterException
        Validates input text
        Returns:
        true if data consists only of english letters
        Throws:
        InvalidCharacterException - when an encountered character is not a letter from english alphabet

        Parameters:

        remove - char to remove from the plot
        Returns:
        char array with the plot
